body.name: Vortix Wireless Game Console, Retro X2 Plug and Play Video Games for TV, 4K HD Arcade Home TV Mini Game Stick, Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers, Built in 20000+ Games (64G)
features: 🎮Package Including: Game Console *1, Game Controllers *2, USB Receiver *1, Memory Card *1, HDMI Extension Cable *1, Data Cable *1, Instructions *1.
🎮Supports HDMI interface output, plug and play, no need for conversion; can be connected to a computer, TV, monitor, projector, etc.
🎮Comes with 2 Pieces 2.4G wireless controllers for two-player games; additional purchase of two controllers supports four-player multiplayer.

🎮Features game search, game collection, save/load function, and mid-game pause function. 20000+ two-player battle games, loads of nostalgic double-player classic games, letting you relive childhood fun.
🎮Professional gaming system with a simple and user-friendly interface, supporting 28 major emulators.
body.description: Wireless Game Console, Retro X2 Plug and Play Video Games for TV, 4K HD Arcade Home TV Mini Game Stick, Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers, Built in 20000+ Games (64G)Any problem please feel free to contact us, we will try our best to solve the problem for you!!!Specifications:.Material: Plastic + Electronic Components.Operating System: Linux RetroArch Emuelec 4.3 System.CPU: S905L.Main Frequency: Dual-core Cortex-A7 up to 1.0GHz.Game Content: 64G: 20000+ Games.Language Support: Switch between 20+ languages: English, German, French, Korean, Japanese, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, etc....Memory Performance: DDR3 512M.Support External TF: Expandable up to 128G.Output: HDMI, 1080P, 720P.Remote Control Frequency: 2.4G.Remote Control Battery: 4*AAA (Not Included).Product Weight: 450g.Product Dimensions: 17 x 13 x 10cm.Package Dimensions: 19 x 14 x 10cm.Package Weight: 500g.Packing: Graphic CartonPackage Including:.Game Console *1.Game Controllers *2.USB Receiver *1.Memory Card *1.HDMI Extension Cable *1.Data Cable *1.Instructions *1
